hero.heroTitle: Online food ordering app based on biddings
hero.heroDesc: After registration you can browse offers from different shops with variant categories. Make your bid and place your order if you are the lucky winner!

features.featureIDesc: Receive your order at your doorstep, and track the driver all the way.
features.featureIIDesc: You can choose to pick-up the order yourself if you're heading out!
features.featureIIIDesc: You can pay online for contact-less deliveries with no extra charges.
features.featureIVDesc: Pay for order when you receive it if you prefer the cash payments.

about.descriptionI: Auction is a new shopping service that relies on the bidding concept which allows the shops to showcase specific products of their choice and offer it for bidding.
about.descriptionII: Customers can find the offers nearby their locations and submit bids which if won; they can place an order with their preferred payment and delivery options. So the product can be delivered to your doorstep by our drivers or you can even pick it up yourself!

features: Largest shop list for customers to place a bid on their favourite food.
Home delivery, cash on delivery available.
Opportunity to become a registered driver.
Driver has the ability to approve or rejet any order from his order list.
At a time he'll get one order to deliver.
Able to receive notifications for orders related events.
Able to see his Total transaction history.

registration.registrationTitle: Register Now as Driver or Shop Owner

download.description: View recent offers and submit bids over them, place your order and track it until delivered to your doorstep.
